topics.body:
"@Grieffon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/539769006368725f32dc0200#post_539769006368725f32dc0200
that is correct. However, western rpgs usually lack the time or space for as much music because they try to make gameplay a bigger priority and tend to eschew turn based. 

It's comparative advantage in an economic sense
